text: A muaki, bakhomba, minu thubidi mambu momo mu diambu di minu veka ayi mu diambu di Apolo. Buawu bobo kifuani kieto kilenda kulusadisa mu sudika mambu momo mu diambu lubika sabuka ndilu yi mambu momo masonama. Ayi kadi mutu mu beno kabika ba luniemo mu diambu di wunkaka muingi kalenda wunkaka.
